mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xm_user( username,password, salt,gender, phone,avatar,nickname, is_delete,created_user, created_time,modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES( #{username},#{password}, #{salt},#{gender}, #{phone},#{avatar},#{username}, #{isDelete},#{createdUser}, #{createdTime},#{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT uid,username,password, salt,avatar, is_delete isDelete FROM xm_user WHERE username=#{username}
SELECT COUNT(phone) FROM xm_user WHERE phone=#{phone}
SELECT nickname,email, phone,gender, password,salt, is_delete isDelete FROM xm_user WHERE uid=#{uid}
mapper.update: UPDATE xm_user SET nickname=#{nickname}, email=#{email}, gender=#{gender}, modified_user=#{modifiedUser}, modified_time=#{modifiedTime} WHERE uid=#{uid}
UPDATE xm_user SET avatar=#{avatar},modified_user=#{modifiedUser}, modified_time=#{modifiedTime} WHERE uid=#{uid}
